jobTitle: ITS Analytics Consultant - Denver and Seattle
jobDescription: About the role:  The Analytics Consultant focuses on building impactful data visualization and solutions to support business decisions at Avanade. Its goal is to support the use of data-driven insights in business performance, opportunities for improvement and identification of root cause problem analysis.  Day-to-day, you will: Gather requirements for business analysis from end users and document the sameUnderstand business objectives of analysis and document the sameRationalize and identify use cases for developing data visualization, including identifying different personas for each use caseProvide input and guidance on data visualization techniques and opportunitiesUndertake data analysis and collaborate with business domain SMEs to pose business questions and shape data to meet data visualization needsBuild prototypes that lead to optimal value extraction from the data and then work with engineers to industrialize the solutionDevelop data models, data shaping logic and data visualizations using Power BIUse Power BI, Excel, Power Query, PowerPivot and DAX to develop Power BI Models/Solutions Qualifications
